context: CoreWeave went public in 2025, becoming a major AI infrastructure company. The company operates massive GPU clusters with NVIDIA H100 and Blackwell chips, serving AI labs and enterprises building foundation models.

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services
competitors.notes: Dominant cloud with Trainium/Inferentia chips and NVIDIA GPUs

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Cloud partner with OpenAI, massive GPU infrastructure investments

competitors.name: Google Cloud
competitors.notes: TPU and GPU cloud with Gemini AI integration

competitors.notes: Aggressive AI cloud expansion with NVIDIA partnership

competitors.notes: Focused GPU cloud for AI training

competitors.name: Nebius
competitors.notes: AI cloud from Yandex spinoff with European focus
